Now for the playoffs in Gisborne Premier netball https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/20/now-for-the-playoffs-in-gisborne-premier-netball/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/20/now-for-the-playoffs-in-gisborne-premier-netball/ Semifinals: YMP (1) v Whāngārā Old Girls; Waikohu Prems v Horouta Koura. Mon, 19 Aug 2024 17:00:00 +0000 YMP (1) topped the Gisborne Premier Grade points table and face defending champions Whāngārā Old Girls in tomorrow's sudden-death semifinals at the YMCA, with the grand final on Saturday. Pivotal to YMP's success has been the shooting of Paku-Jane Skudder, pictured lining up a shot against Whāngārā on Saturday as goal keep Joaquina Kaa tries to block it. YMP won 60-46. Photo / Murray Robertson

Photo / Tink M Lockett
